device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
use_cases_desc:
Focus on active reading application.
Overview, reading stack, etc.
Introduce conduit gestures.

Many advanced techniques: stack distribution, auto-tags, stack saving and restoring, multi-doc view, document overview, annotation, remote control.
evaluation: Observations; User study (qualitative); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc: About multi-slate reading environment for supporting active reading activities. Introduces new type of hardware -- the United Slates -- (e-ink and display based), simple sensing/connectivity, and later a set of techniques. Includes evaluation. Longer journal article based on shorter earlier papers.
interaction_techniques: Data transfer/sharing; UI distribution; Conduit gestures; Proxy devices; Proximity link
crossdevice_def:
Multi-slate environment. Focus on e-ink tablets, comparable to tablets.
Introduce terminology of conduit gestures.
